data.title: How much do Ignition employees make?
data.meta_description: The average annual salary of Ignition is estimated to be approximate $111,302 per year. The majority pay is between $97,757 to $126,061 per year. Visit Salary.com to find out Ignition salary, Ignition pay rate, and more.
data.text:
View salary at Ignition by Job Title BETA

The average salary of Ignition jobs will vary depending on the location, industry, category, and department. The table below shows the job titles you might be interested in and the salary range of different positions at Ignition. A difference in pay for the same job title may be based on a number of factors, such as experience, training, level of education, skills and competencies, and so on. Co-Founder jobs at Ignition earn the most with an average annual salary of $861,579, while Sales Development Representative jobs earn the least with an average annual salary of $31,932.

The estimate average salary for Ignition employees is around $111,302 per year, or the hourly rate of Ignition rate is $54. The highest earners in the top 75th percentile are paid over $126,061. Individual salaries will vary depending on the job, department, and location, as well as the employee’s level of education, certifications, and additional skills.

Head of Account Management $151,347 - $196,845 $174,313 Ignition Director, Production $141,515 - $182,807 $161,827 Ignition Office Administrator $134,174 - $173,967 $154,103 Ignition Executive Creative Director $127,949 - $173,322 $150,408 Ignition

DISCLAIMER: The salary range presented here is an estimation that has been derived from our proprietary algorithm. It should be noted that this range does not originate from the company's factual payroll records or survey data.

1. How much does Ignition in the United States pay?

Ignition pays its employees an average of $111,302 per year. The average salary at Ignition range from $97,757 to $126,061 per year. Co-Founder jobs at Ignition earn the most with an average annual salary of $861,579, while Sales Development Representative jobs earn the least with an average annual salary of $31,932.

2. Do Ignition employees get a higher salary than other similar companies?

The salary at Ignition is lesser than Disney Advertising Sales. The highest salary package reported for an employee at Ignition is $126,061 per year, meanwhile the highest salary package reported for an employee at Disney Advertising Sales is $130,853 per year.

3. How much does Ignition pay compared to Disney Advertising Sales?

The average annual salary at Ignition is $111,302, or an hourly wage of $54, in comparison to Disney Advertising Sales which pays $115,532 per year or $56 per hour.

4. Which job skills can boost a Director, Accounting salary at Ignition?

Accounting, Leadership and Presentation are key to a Director, Accounting job at Ignition. Possessing these skills could lead to a higher salary. You can learn and develop high income skills now if you’re looking for a position at Ignition.

5. What is the lowest salary at Ignition?

The lowest paying job at Ignition is Sales Development Representative with an annual salary of $31,932 or an hourly rate of $54.
